title: What champion has the most satisfying wave clear?
body: I don't play TF, but watching him Red Card into Q is really satisfying to watch.

replies.body: {{champion:34}} Watching minions struggle to cross her ult reminds me of all the fools trying to invade Mother Russia in Winter.
Ryze oneshotting the wave with Q bounce so you see a 500 damage magic crit pop up next to every single minion.

Syndra. 
Something about throwing a minion at another minion is great

> [{quoted}](name=420 grams,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JPLgqEQQ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-08-05T23:09:40.819+0000)
>
> Syndra. 
> Something about throwing a minion at another minion is great

this... its not the best wave clear by a long shot

but it is _certainly_ the most satisfying
{{champion:103}} is one for me, i love throwing the orb forward  while the minions are running down the lane and hearing the coin collect sound on its return.

its not perfect, but with full CD you can take down massive waves with {{champion:245}} Q and passive and the sound it makes :) 

And if all the minions are walking in a line like top or bot lane :P
How has no one said {{champion:41}}

{{champion:61}}  Ori's clear is very satisfying for me. Just throwing the Q + W mid game can dang near one shot the minion waves. 

{{champion:39}} + {{item:3077}} I like building passive up and then dancing around the lane with Q spams since Tiamat will go off. Very fast and satisfying clears.

{{champion:84}} I'm digging her new clear with Q as long as I have energy for it haha. It does so much damage to minions at rank 5.
Malzahars Malefic Visions, just for that moment your opponent gets too close and it _Pings_ onto them
{{champion:26}}
It's that satisfying Bladesurging Irelia with a tiamat, zooming on to the wave of caster minions. {{champion:39}}
Ryze, and sivir vs big waves....also, nunu ult vs really bug waves

{{champion:86}} {{item:3077}}

you can use the active during the spin.
{{champion:103}} wave clear is very satisfying because she uses her q and she kill the caster minions and then you use your w to kill each melee minons xD{{champion:103}}
{{champion:15}} once she has damage. It's so fun to watch.
{{champion:142}}

Pre-rework Vlad.

Now, his E is basically just an Ezreal skillshot in every direction. Before, if you were in a ~600 radius of him you just got smacked with his E damage. I've never seen a champion clear as quickly and efficiently as old Vlad pressing E.
Yorick. You can just sit back and watch.
Viktor pulling 3 waves of minions into the center of his W then erasing them with an E.

Velâ€™koz {{champion:161}} for me. All I do is just use a combo of E and W through the minion waves, and clean up the rest with Q. The way his tentacles move around after an E and W combo is really well done too, and to add to that the true damage procs are beautiful.
I sometimes nickname him my minion lawnmower he gets rid of waves so fast!
Azir. Azir's soldiers make waveclearing really fun.
Swain's q
And you get that mana back... feels good.

I don't think it gets much better than TF as far as waveclear is concerned. Maybe Tristana once she picks up IE and a Zeal upgrade.

Kayle mowing down waves with Righteous Fury isn't too bad either.
Brand or Morgana for me
